details.purpose: Generates a Slurm job array to execute a mini-app with all mutations.
details.input: Requires environment variables: MPI_CORRECTNESS_BM_DIR, MPI_CORRECTNESS_BM_EXPERIMENT_DIR. Takes two arguments: TOOL (e.g., 'MUST', 'MPI-Checker', 'PARCOACH'), APP (e.g., 'kripke', 'amg2013', 'lulesh')
details.output: Creates a Slurm job script at $SCRIPTS_DIR/$TOOL/$APP.sh

resources.storage: Requires the following directories to exist: $MPI_CORRECTNESS_BM_DIR, $MPI_CORRECTNESS_BM_EXPERIMENT_DIR, $SCRIPTS_DIR/$TOOL, $SRC_DIR/2-level/patches/$APP/mutations/
